fields.Title: LIFELINE / GIVING UP
fields.Description: When you lose enough Morale (Volition), you feel like giving up. This is the freebie/tutorial.

!(Variable["stats.giving_t_inland"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't dispute that you have been..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't dispute that you have been charged with protecting the people of a particularly... challenging district. But poverty does not make one a loser -- poverty is just... poverty."

fields.Title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You're still coming up with sentenc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're still coming up with sentences. That's a step up from total annihilation, right?

fields.Title: Volition: "Nothing you can say would make you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing you can say would make you feel any better now...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "There's something else in there. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something else in there. There has to be. But -- it's like reaching your hand into muddy water, fishing around, and coming up with nothing...

fields.Title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm seriously running out of shits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give, Cuno. I'm quitting."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give. Let corpses hang on trees! I'm quitting."

fields.Title: You: "Fuck Martinaise, fuck Revachol. And..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fuck Martinaise, fuck Revachol. And fuck me. I'm done.

fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure you're shit out of luck *fishing around* right now. You're drowning.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Too late for that. So whatcha gonn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too late for that. So whatcha gonna do now? Skewer yourself?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cuno don't give a shit about your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno don't give a shit about your shits."

fields.Title: You: ""I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck you, fuck you Cuno."

fields.Title: You: ""I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck you, fuck you."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""That you are a loser, Cuno doesn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That you are a loser, Cuno doesn't doubt, but why go around whining about it?"

fields.Title: You: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm done. No one even likes cops.

fields.Title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cuno knew the pig was a f****t.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno knew the pig was a f****t."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm done. No one even likes cops.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."

fields.Title: Volition: "Despair creeps into you, getting fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Despair creeps into you, getting fat on your weakness. Whatever noble intentions you once had as a police officer -- it's eating them all up now.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm done. No one even likes cops.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."

fields.Title: You: "I'm seriously running out of shits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm seriously running out of shits to give. To hell with all of this.
fields.Alternate1: I'm seriously running out of shits to give. To hell with it.

fields.Title: Jump to: [NewspaperEndgame("GIVING_UP", "COP G ...]
You: ""I'm seriously running out of shits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give, Kim. Fuck you."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give. Let corpses hang on trees! I'm quitting. Fuck you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck me? I understand this is by n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck me? I understand this is by no means an easy investigation, but..."
fields.Alternate1: "Fuck me? Please leave the *rage* you have for after we finish the investigation."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Untitled hub (02)
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it can be difficult to be on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it can be difficult to be on the receiving end of so much distrust and outright hatred," he says with a sad half-smile.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He watches your meltdown stoically..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He watches your meltdown stoically from behind the lenses of his glasses.
